amendment.description: Amendment sought to lengthen the time period for filing a claim under the Act from 60 days to 1 year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-88 to lengthen the time period for filing a claim under the Act from 60 days to 1 year.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 234 (Roll no. 175).
